task_name: Implement RabbitMQ Durability, Persistence, and DLQ Configuration
resource_notes: Requires deep understanding of RabbitMQ broker behavior to test correctly.
alternative_approach: None, this is a core reliability requirement.
risk_factors: Incorrect configuration can lead to silent data loss (RISK-007).
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory integration test simulating broker restart and message failure.

task_name: Research and POC for EF Core with pgcrypto
resource_notes: Critical research task to de-risk a core HIPAA requirement (RISK-001).
alternative_approach: Consider application-level encryption if pgcrypto integration is too complex, but this has performance implications.
risk_factors: Chosen implementation pattern may be inefficient or hard to maintain.
mitigation_strategy: Timebox research to 3 days. Peer review of POC and design document by another senior developer.

task_name: Research and Implement Low-Level Input Monitor
resource_notes: Technically complex and high-risk task. Performance impact is a major concern.
alternative_approach: Use a simpler polling mechanism if a hook-based approach is unstable, accepting less accurate inactivity detection.
risk_factors: Potential for performance degradation or application instability. Could consume more time than estimated, delaying entire session lock feature.
mitigation_strategy: Allocate dedicated research time (spike). Pair program with full-stack developer to share knowledge. Performance profile the solution rigorously.

task_name: E2E Test for Lock and Unlock Workflow
resource_notes: High risk of test flakiness due to timing sensitivity of the inactivity lock.
alternative_approach: Combine with manual exploratory testing if full automation proves unreliable.
risk_factors: Test may be unstable in CI/CD pipeline, creating noise and reducing confidence.
mitigation_strategy: Work with frontend dev to implement test hooks to control/mock timers. Run the test suite multiple times to ensure stability before merging.
